attributes.action: take £1 per month from our wages to give to charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would give charitys around £20 million per month and can run a very good organisation without fear of closure, ie, great ormond street, nspcc, cancer research, aids research, rspca, banardos, e.t.c this would help a lot of people thanks to the our generosity. thank you
